column2: IU International University of Applied Sciences
column3: IU International University of Applied Sciences
column5: Database administration, business intelligence and reporting services are here to stay due to their future-focused nature. The online master's degree in Business Intelligence offers a well-rounded understanding of business intelligence with options for in-depth knowledge and enables you to take on responsibility in processing, storing and visualising companies’ data. It gives you all the tools you need to carve out a successful career in the sector, and it is accessible to everyone.
column7: Please check out IU's website for further information
